title: Siddy's fish pie
ingredients: ['600ml milk', '1 fillet smoked haddock, chopped', '1 fillet cod, chopped', '1 fillet pollock, chopped', '1 onion, roughly diced', '1 bay leaf', '3 cloves', '110g butter', '45g plain flour', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '20g chopped fresh parsley', '80ml double cream', 'salt, to taste', '4 eggs, hard boiled', '2 to 3 large potatoes, peeled and diced']
